description:
This module covers data science for the Internet of Things.
The topics include data science fundamentals such as
Bayesian statisitcs, classification, supervised learning,
unsupervised learning, and deep learning. The module will
also cover several basic machine learning algorithms such
as decision trees, logistic regression, support vector
machines, and neural networks. Students will visualize
and analyze real-world data sets via practical IoT case
studies.
title: Data Science for Internet of Things
